Title: Limits the experiential qualifications of child day care center employees to what was required for their educational qualifications
Summary: Limits the experiential qualifications of group teachers for preschool classes and groups teachers for infant or toddler classes to what was required for their educational qualifications.
LawCode: Amd ยง390-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to qualifications for employees of child day care centers
